chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams base_params
pb_params: PrimaryBackupParams base_params

Goal:
forall (A : Type) (xs ys : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace xs -> no_output_at_backup_trace ys -> no_output_at_backup_trace (xs ++ ys)

Premises:
Record PrimaryBackupParams (base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_PrimaryBackupParams { input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_PrimaryBackupParams _ _%function_scope
Inductive name : Set := Primary : name | Backup : name
Inductive PB_output : Type := RequestResponse : input -> output -> PB_output | ReadResponse : data -> PB_output
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
no_output_at_backup_trace = fun (A : Type) (tr : list (name * (A + list PB_output))) => forall x : name * (A + list PB_output), In x tr -> no_output_at_backup x : forall A : Type, list (name * (A + list PB_output)) -> Prop Arguments no_output_at_backup_trace {A}%type_scope _%list_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj
NOABT_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) (y : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup x -> no_output_at_backup_trace y -> no_output_at_backup_trace (x :: y)
NOABT_tail : forall (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) (y : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace (x :: y) -> no_output_at_backup_trace y
NOABT_head : forall (A : Type) (x : name * (A + list PB_output)) (y : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace (x :: y) -> no_output_at_backup x
app_Prefix : forall (A : Type) (xs ys zs : list A), xs ++ ys = zs -> Prefix xs zs
NOABT_contra : forall (A : Type) (l : list PB_output) (tr : list (name * (A + list PB_output))), no_output_at_backup_trace ((Backup, inr l) :: tr) -> l = [] \/ (exists d : data, l = [ReadResponse d])
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- FailureParams ?P]
outputs_m_revert_trace : forall tr : list (name * (input + list PB_output)), no_output_at_backup_trace tr -> outputs_m tr = outputs_1 (revert_trace tr)
step_failure_disk_ops_ind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_failure_disk_ops_sind : forall P : list do_name * do_network -> list do_name * do_network -> list (do_name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- BaseParams] ?P : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
app_cons_singleton_inv : forall (A : Type) (xs : list A) (y : A) (zs : list A) (w : A), xs ++ y :: zs = [w] -> xs = [] /\ y = w /\ zs = []
Inductive step_drop (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepDrop_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_drop net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_drop {P params} Arguments StepDrop_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_drop {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments StepDrop_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
Inductive step_dup (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepDup_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> step_dup net net' [] Arguments step_dup {P params} Arguments StepDup_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepDup_dup {P params} _ [net' p] (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed,...
step_async_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
Inductive step_failure_disk_ops (P0 : BaseParams) (P : DiskOpMultiParams P0) (disk_op_failure_params : DiskOpFailureParams P) : step_relation (list do_name * do_network) (do_name * (input + list output)) := StepFailureDiskOp_deliver : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (do_pDst p) failed -> do_net_handlers (do_pDst p) (do_pSrc p) (do_pBody p) (nwdoState net (do_pDst p)) = (ops, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := do_send_packets (do_pDst p)...
null = fun (A : Type) (xs : list A) => match xs with | [] => true | _ :: _ => false end : forall A : Type, list A -> bool Arguments null {A}%type_scope _%list_scope
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?rel : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_async net net' [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] Arguments step_async {P params} Arguments StepAsync_deliver {P params} _ [net'] _ (_ _)%list_scope [out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope Arguments StepAsync_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [out]%list_scope _ [d] [l]%list_scope
NOABT_nil : forall A : Type, no_output_at_backup_trace []
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type] ?B : [base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams base_params pb_params : PrimaryBackupParams base_params |- Type]
